Single, teams and training fights are available. ğŸµ Arena Proximo (â›) â€” there is a small construction camp taking place near the main arena. arenaMaximusMenuMessage: %{characterTag} Welcome to the ğŸ† Arena Maximus! You can participate in single, teams and training fights, increase your rating and experience, as well as earn tokens. arenaProximoMenuMessage: %{characterTag} Welcome to the ğŸµ Arena Proximo! You can take part in the single and teams fights of equals. Where all heroes have basic skills and become equal in strength. Here you can rely only on your mastership fight mastery. Ante is ğŸª™ %{anteProximo} tokens Now you have ğŸª™ %{tokens} tokens
characterBusyMessage: ğŸš« Now you can not fight and visit the town, because your character is busy with: %{busyLabel}
proximoBackMessage: You left the construction area and returned to the arena square.
proximoIntroMessage: Near the construction area, you meet a pretty smart elder who is interested in your help
proximoStoryMessage:
Greetings, fighter!

My name is Proximo, I come from the eastern lands, from a small town called Scimitar. In Gladios came a while ago, and already without an eye. Fortunately, I'm fighting better than joking, and for that, at home, I was honored as the master of the fights. By the will of fate, I had to leave my native land and find a new home, so I went to the Gladios.

I don't like sitting on my hands, that's why I decided to build Arena of Equals here, in Gladios.

Will you be able to help me with that?
proximoInvestQuestion: How much gold are you willing to invest in the construction? Now you have ğŸ’°%{gold} gold.
proximoInvestError: Wrong value, try to specify an integer value, in the range 25-10000
proximoInvestSuccess: Thank you, fighter! This gold will help us complete the construction faster. I will add you to the honor board and everyone will be able to thank you for your contribution. You've successfully invested ğŸ’°%{value} of gold
proximoInvestNoGold: Not enough gold. You have only ğŸ’°%{gold} gold.
proximoMiningMessage: You come closer to the stone quarry and see the people working on stones mining. Mined stones are loaded into carts and transported to the construction area of the new arena. The work goes smoothly, it is immediately evident that here they work in good faith. Will you help them with the stones mining? â—During work you will not be able to join fights or visiting town.
